ABOUT.HELPTRANSLATE: Hjælp med at oversætte denne app

THANKS.TITLE: Tak til
THANKS.TEXT: A big thanks to the following people for translating the app in their native language or helping to test the application:
THANKS.MISSINGNAME: If your name is missing from this list, send me a message on Crowdin!

EDIT_TRIGGER.CRON_HELPER: Her kan du finde flere oplysninger om, hvordan du formaterer en CRON-streng. Kun tal, *, / og - er tilladt.
EDIT_TRIGGER.FORMAT_ERROR: Angivet cron-streng er i et forkert format. Tjek her for formatering regler. Kun tal, mellemrum, *, / og - er tilladt.

MOVIEJOBRUNNING.BODY: Movie job is running, please wait until it is finished
MOVIEJOBRUNNING.TITLE: Movie job running

NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any movies in the EmbyStat database. If you have movies in {{type}} you should try starting a new movie syncronisation task.
NOMOVIETYPEFOUND.TITLE: Ingen film fundet

NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.BODY: We couldn't find any shows in the EmbyStat database. If you have shows in {{type}} you should try starting a new show syncronisation task.
NOSHOWTYPEFOUND.TITLE: Ingen shows fundet

SHOWJOBRUNNING.BODY: Show job is running, please wait until it is finished
SHOWJOBRUNNING.TITLE: Show job running

DIALOG.CONTENT: Select field on which you want to add a new filter
DIALOG.TITLE: Add new filter

INFO.MOVIE-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your movie collection. This can take some time to run!
INFO.PINGDESCRIPTION: Ping the Emby server to check if he is still online.
INFO.SHOW-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your show collection. This can take some time to run!
INFO.SYSTEM-SYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform a small sync with Emby server. This is a fast and small system update only.
INFO.UPDATE-CHECKERDESCRIPTION: Checks for new updates on your selected update train.

ACCOUNT.CONTENT: Change your admin username here. New username will be required on next login.
ACCOUNT.USERNAMEUPDATEFAILED: Username update failed, check the logs for more info

LIBRARIES.CONTENT: Select here all {{type}} libraries that should be synced with EmbyStat
LIBRARIES.TITLE: Libraries

MEDIASERVER.APIKEYHINT: Go to advanced -> security on your {{type}} server to generate a new API token.

DIALOG.CONTENT: Because you are changing the server configuration it might be a good idea to also reset the EmbyStat statistics. Do this only when you are connecting to a new server with different media/users/... If you are still connecting to the same server you don't need to reset the EmbyStat statistics.
DIALOG.TITLE: Reset database?

MEDIASERVER.RESETINFO: Starting the EmbyStat reset process. This can take some time depending on the size of the database. Please wait until it is finished.
MEDIASERVER.TITLE: {{type}} settings

PASSWORD.CONTENT: For changing your password, fill in the current one and your new one twice.
PASSWORD.PASSWORDMINLENGTH: Password length must be minimal 6 characters
PASSWORD.TITLE: Password

ROLLBAR.EXCEPTIONLOGGING: Enable/disable the exception logging to the online Rollbar service. With this logging I can debug and fix the application faster. No personal data is ever recorded, only exception messages, stacktrace, OS name and version number.
ROLLBAR.TITLE: Rollbar

TMDB.APIKEYWARNING: If you want you can supply EmbyStat with your own TMDb API key here. Make sure you supply a working API key! If the key is incorrect the synchronization task will fail.
TMDB.LABEL: TMDb API key
TMDB.NOAPIKEY: API key can not be empty
TMDB.TITLE: TMDb connection

WIZARD.APIKEYFAILED: We tried to contact your {{type}} server but it seems to fail. Please go back, correct the configuration and try again.
WIZARD.CROWDINHELP: If your language is not mentioned or not complete, feel free to help me translate the app in your langauge on Crowdin
WIZARD.FINISHED: All settings are saved and you can start using your EmbyStat server now. Enjoy your new statistics!
WIZARD.FINISHEXPLANATION: Best thing to do first is start a movie and show synchronization job. EmbyStat will start downloading all data from your {{type}} server. Keep in mind that these tasks can take a long time depending on your collection size. You can start the jobs manually by navigating to the Jobs page after login.
WIZARD.FOUNDTEXT: We found the following servers in your network. Select the one you want to connect to. If your server is not displayed you can create a server connection manually.
WIZARD.INTROTEXT:
Velkommen til guiden til EmbyStat-server.

Med denne guide opretter vi de grundlæggende indstillinger, så du kan begynde at arbejde med EmbyStat uden for meget hovedpine. Når guiden er færdig, kan du nyde alle funktioner på serveren. Hvis du vil tilpasse serveren mere, kan du altid gå til Indstillinger.

Nu skal vi bare vide, hvad vi skal kalde dig og hvilket sprog, du ønsker at få vist brugergrænsefladen på.

JELLYFIN.ADMINTEXT: Because you are using Jellyfin you have to provide an administrator account that you want to use to fetch data from the server. Please select the wanted administrator from the dropdown list.

WIZARD.LANWANCHOISE: Choose the correct address to use for your connection to the {{type}} server.
WIZARD.NOTFOUNDTEXT: Now we will setup your {{type}} connection. We tried to auto detect your Emby server in the network but failed. Fill in all fields so EmbyStat can find your Emby server.
WIZARD.SELECTLIBRARIES: Select all libraries you want to include in the {{type}} statistics calculations. All {{type}} libraries are selected by default. If you want you can change it later in the settings page.
WIZARD.STEPONE: Checking if API key is valid ({{step}}/{{total}})
WIZARD.TITLE: Wizard
WIZARD.USERDETAILTEXT: Provide a username and password for your admin user
